channel.title: How would i add working pk points from kills and exchange shop for them?
channel.description: Well i've seen all the new servers these days and they all seem to have pk points and a shop to exchange them in, and i was wondering if someone could teach/show me how to do this, if you can please post, idc if you dont wanna spoon feed me, but ill need to learn the basics and then i can catch on but atm i have no idea how to even do anything with it.

item.title: How would i add working pk points from kills and exchange shop for them?
item.dc:creator: @cosar cosar
item.description:
@cosar wrote:

[quote=“hyphy ftw, post:4, topic:314768”]So this seems right?

sendQuest("@or1@Pk Points: @gre@"+pkPoints+"", 7332); ( to show how many you have )

public int tellTimer = 300;
public int isvenging = 0;
public int vengtimer = 0;
public int tradeTimer = 0;
public int pkPoints = 0;

(for public int)

		characterfile.newLine();
		characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length());

to add pk points to char files.?

if (MyShopID == 44) {
if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0){
pkPoints -= TotPrice2;
addItem(itemID, 1);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1)
> server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
break;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough PK points for this item.”);
}
}

For shop?

				}  else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) {
					pkPoints = Integer.parseInt

To make pk points work

				if (MyShopID == 44) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Pk points"+ShopAdd);

to make shop use pk points instead of coins?

youdied();
if(KillerId != -1) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
killerz.sM(“You have downed the shit out of “+playerName+”.”);
killerz.pkPoints += 2;
KillerId = -1;
}
}

So you get pk points?

If i did it right can you tell me?
Thanks, i think i got it right anyways…[/quote]

Woooow nice ! thanks

Read full topic

killerz.pkPoints += 1;

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
killerz.sM(“You have just roflpwned “+playerName+”.”);
killerz.pkPoints += 2;

item.source: How would i add working pk points from kills and exchange shop for them?

item.title: How would i add working pk points from kills and exchange shop for them?
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

ignore the idiots.

One thing you have to be very careful with on 317 is adding the things that edit the character files.
Depending on your source there is probably something like a didkill didslay etc function. Youll have to look through your client.java for the pking/combat booleans. Once you find them add a simple pkpoints += 1 like you did.
If your looking for an example to go off of. pvp-evolution is an all pk server with a point exchange. Its delta. ( i think) you can just take the scripts out you need.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

So this seems right?

sendQuest("@or1@Pk Points: @gre@"+pkPoints+"", 7332); ( to show how many you have )

public int tellTimer = 300;
public int isvenging = 0;
public int vengtimer = 0;
public int tradeTimer = 0;
public int pkPoints = 0;

(for public int)

		characterfile.newLine();
		characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length());

to add pk points to char files.?

if (MyShopID == 44) {
if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0){
pkPoints -= TotPrice2;
addItem(itemID, 1);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1)
> server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
break;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough PK points for this item.”);
}
}

For shop?

				}  else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) {
					pkPoints = Integer.parseInt

To make pk points work

				if (MyShopID == 44) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Pk points"+ShopAdd);

to make shop use pk points instead of coins?

youdied();
if(KillerId != -1) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
killerz.sM(“You have downed the shit out of “+playerName+”.”);
killerz.pkPoints += 2;
KillerId = -1;
}
}

So you get pk points?

If i did it right can you tell me?
Thanks, i think i got it right anyways…

Here’s what I did. In your main file, create an int Example: “PKpoint = 0”
Then find your death method somewhere and for player two when they die add PKpoint = 1;
